resources.string: this Yellow body Mazing in a Hard Maze "MazeMan", our hero, munches his way around the map, eating all of the dots. However, life isn\'t easy for our young little hero. Along his journey, he faces spooky ghosts who will try to hurt him. Avoid them! In each corner of the map, there is a power pellet. If MazeMan eats a power pellet, he is temporarily gains the power to eat enemy ghosts.

Up: Swipe Up
Down: Swipe Down
Left: Swipe Left
Right: Swipe Right
App Developers: Hallumi muhammed, Roi shmeuli, Yair shur
Developed in the Introduction to Mobile Computing Course, 2018. Instructors: Dr. Amnon Dekel and Amir Uval. Â© 2018 - The Dept. of Software Engineering, Shenkar: Engineering. Design. Art.
